title: WTB: Ty Cobb t206 Bat On/Off Shoulder (will pay up to $1600 depending on cond.)
author: ynnek4

posts.post_title: WTB: Ty Cobb t206 Bat On/Off Shoulder (will pay up to $1600 depending on cond.)
posts.post_content:
Hi, 

I am looking for one or both of these in PSA 3-5 condition.  Preferably a Polar Bear back for the "on shoulder." If not Polar Bear another back OK.  For "on shoulder" any back will do.  Willing to pay upwards of $1600 for either.

Can pay by Paypal "gift" if needed.

(I am indeed new but please see my eBay feedback under my same Net54 screen name.)

Thanks!

posts.post_title: No Cobb Bat On with Polar Bear Back
posts.post_content:
FYI, Cobb Bat ON Shoulder was not printed with a Polar Bear back.

Best Regards and Happy Collecting  :)
Craig

[quote name="White Borders" post=1025621]FYI, Cobb Bat ON Shoulder was not printed with a Polar Bear back.

Best Regards and Happy Collecting  :)
Craig[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the heads up!
Either pose will do.  "bat on" or bat off" and any back.  at least SGC 50 or PSA 3.5-4.  Would trade (SGC '33 Goudey Ruth #181) but willing to just buy outright.

Wiling to pay $1500-1600 for a nice PSA 3.5-4 T206 "Bat On" Cobb.  Would also be interested in PSA 3's.

Let me know.  Thanks.

"Still looking Bump"

Willing to pay $1500-1600 for a nice PSA 4-4.5 "bat on."

Thanks.

There is one on ebay right now.
[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-Sweet-Caporal-T206-Ty-Cobb-Bat-on-Shoulder-SGC-50-VG-EX-/110937233391?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item19d45fd7ef[/url]
